body: Wtf is with this author .. he's just teasing the fans .. 4 pages a month .. 60 pages for a story .. 1 year waiting .. you need to subscribe to him monthly to read 4 pages .. At this point I'm more pissed off than excited .. this boy is greedy as fck

I think he realizes that the main story is shit so he distracts himself by making these side stories. He can't wait til the end of the main story to further imply that Michiru is a cock hungry whore who would fuck everyone as long as they flash their dicks. In a sense, he might think that these side stories are fan service, when in reality it's just... Lazy. Sorry to say. Well... The 2nd part is expected to be your average NTR, but I just hope that the wait will be worth it. Hoping that there will be plot twists that intrigues us to keep up with the series. Cuz not gonna lie, the art is hot.
At this point, i'm just speechless with the authors work ethics. It's like jabcomix all over again.
Wonder how long this story will go

@Ealstrom 

Its "@andrew_andoryu", but he posts stuff like this on his fanbox.
Ohhh come on...I really want okaa san part 2 plzzz
